name.from sentence: ( 1 ) S2S : Sequence - to - sequence framework has been proposed for language generation task .

S2SR.from sentence: ( 2 ) S2SR : We simply add the reader attention on attention distribution ? t , in each decoding step .

CGU.from sentence: ( 3 ) CGU : propose to use the convolutional gated unit to refine the source representation , which achieves the state - of - the - art performance on social media text summarization dataset .

LEAD1.selects: first sentence of document as the summary
LEAD1.from sentence: ( 4 ) LEAD1 : LEAD1 is a commonly used baseline , which selects the first sentence of document as the summary .

TextRank.from sentence: ( 5 ) TextRank : propose to build a graph , then add each sentence as a vertex and use link to represent semantic similarity .
